title: Fifty Shades Watch Face
summary: Sleek and elegant watch face for all Android Wear watches.
developerAddress:
UBR Studios
46 Lakes At Cheshire Dr.
Delaware, OH 43015
description: Simple yet elegant digital watch face displays the time and date in both interactive mode (active) and in ambient mode (if watch screen is set to always on).  Supports both square and round devices.Supports the following Android Wear watches:- Motorola 360- LG G Watch- LG G Watch R- Samsung Gear Live- Sony Smartwatch 3- Asus ZenWatchAmbient mode is designed to maximize both battery life and readability.Short "peek" notification cards are utilized to ensure minimal disruption to the clock face and to protect privacy. The perfect watch face for situations where you need a simple yet interesting design.  You can still easily tell the time with the digital clock with smooth Roboto fonts used throughout. To select this once you have installed it on your connected handheld device, long press on your existing watch face until the watch face picker appears.  May take a couple of minutes for this watch face to show up so if you don't see it right away, please check back in another minute or two.
descriptionHTML:
Simple yet elegant digital watch face displays the time and date in both interactive mode (active) and in ambient mode (if watch screen is set to always on). Supports both square and round devices.

Supports the following Android Wear watches:

- Motorola 360
- LG G Watch
- LG G Watch R
- Samsung Gear Live
- Sony Smartwatch 3
- Asus ZenWatch

Ambient mode is designed to maximize both battery life and readability.


Short "peek" notification cards are utilized to ensure minimal disruption to the clock face and to protect privacy.


The perfect watch face for situations where you need a simple yet interesting design. You can still easily tell the time with the digital clock with smooth Roboto fonts used throughout.


To select this once you have installed it on your connected handheld device, long press on your existing watch face until the watch face picker appears. May take a couple of minutes for this watch face to show up so if you don't see it right away, please check back in another minute or two.
comments: Not working properly I have a sony sw3 and a sony XZ3 phone if I load watch face on watch at say 1:00 I go back check time on watch it's still shows 1:00 I  load different face on watch reload this one at say 1:30 go back and check after 5 to 10 minutes it still shows 1:30
Satisfied Customer! Runs smoothly...Beautiful watch wear!
Not syncing Not appearing on lg g watch
recentChanges: - Increased ambient text for better visibility in brighter conditions
- Changed minimum supported version of connected handheld device to Android 4.3 (required)
